hpnicfEponMibObjects.name: hpnicfEponMibObjects
hpnicfEponMibObjects.description: The objects in this MIB module are used to manage and display current configuration of Ethernet Passive Optical Network (EPON) port which are based on the Ethernet in the First Mile (EFM) Passive Optical Network(PON) as defined in IEEE Draft P802.3ah/D3.0 clause 60, 64, 65..

hpnicfEponAutoAuthorize.name: hpnicfEponAutoAuthorize
hpnicfEponAutoAuthorize.description: This value determines whether software performs self-authorization for each Optical Network Unit(ONU) registering to the network. Setting it to false means for every ONU registering, software requires external authorization, and until it's done the ONU is not authenticated. True value means software authorizes each ONU registering to the network automatically. true - ONUs are always authorized. false - If 802.1x authorization is enable, the ONUs have to be authorized by the protocol. - If 802.1x authorization is disable, ONUs are always authorized.

hpnicfEponMonitorCycle.name: hpnicfEponMonitorCycle
hpnicfEponMonitorCycle.description: The cycle of alarm thresholds checking. Applying to the following types: Bit Error Rate(BER) alarm, Frame Error Rate(FER), Logical Link Identity(LLID) mismatch alarm and so on. The unit is second.

hpnicfEponMsgTimeOut.name: hpnicfEponMsgTimeOut
hpnicfEponMsgTimeOut.description: Timeout waiting for a response from Optical Line Terminal(OLT) firmware after sending it a message. The unit is millisecond.

hpnicfEponMsgLoseNum.name: hpnicfEponMsgLoseNum
hpnicfEponMsgLoseNum.description: The times of messages sending timeouts, after which OLT will reset (applying to every OLT).

hpnicfEponSysHasEPONBoard.name: hpnicfEponSysHasEPONBoard
hpnicfEponSysHasEPONBoard.description: true(1) - At least an EPON board exists. false(2) - No EPON board exists.

hpnicfEponMonitorCycleEnable.name: hpnicfEponMonitorCycleEnable
hpnicfEponMonitorCycleEnable.description: Stop or continue monitoring. true(1) - Continue monitoring. false(2) - Stop monitoring.

hpnicfEponOltSoftwareErrAlmEnable.name: hpnicfEponOltSoftwareErrAlmEnable
hpnicfEponOltSoftwareErrAlmEnable.description: Software error alarm behavior of all active OLTs. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hpnicfEponPortLoopBackAlmEnable.name: hpnicfEponPortLoopBackAlmEnable
hpnicfEponPortLoopBackAlmEnable.description: LoopBack alarm behavior of EPON ports. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hpnicfEponMonitorCycleMinVal.name: hpnicfEponMonitorCycleMinVal
hpnicfEponMonitorCycleMinVal.description: The lower limit of cycle which be confined to the hpnicfEponMonitorCycle.

hpnicfEponMonitorCycleMaxVal.name: hpnicfEponMonitorCycleMaxVal
hpnicfEponMonitorCycleMaxVal.description: The upper limit of cycle which be confined to the hpnicfEponMonitorCycle.

hpnicfEponMsgTimeOutMinVal.name: hpnicfEponMsgTimeOutMinVal
hpnicfEponMsgTimeOutMinVal.description: The lower limit of timeout which be confined to the hpnicfEponMsgTimeOut.

hpnicfEponMsgTimeOutMaxVal.name: hpnicfEponMsgTimeOutMaxVal
hpnicfEponMsgTimeOutMaxVal.description: The upper limit of timeout which be confined to the hpnicfEponMsgTimeOut.

hpnicfEponMsgLoseNumMinVal.name: hpnicfEponMsgLoseNumMinVal
hpnicfEponMsgLoseNumMinVal.description: The lower limit of time which be confined to the hpnicfEponMsgLoseNum.

hpnicfEponMsgLoseNumMaxVal.name: hpnicfEponMsgLoseNumMaxVal
hpnicfEponMsgLoseNumMaxVal.description: The upper limit of time which be confined to the hpnicfEponMsgLoseNum.

hpnicfEponSysManTable.name: hpnicfEponSysManTable
hpnicfEponSysManTable.description: This table defines system related parameters.

hpnicfEponSysManEntry.name: hpnicfEponSysManEntry
hpnicfEponSysManEntry.description: The entry of the table hpnicfEponSysManTable.

hpnicfEponSlotIndex.name: hpnicfEponSlotIndex
hpnicfEponSlotIndex.description: Slot Index, the index of hpnicfEponSysManTable.

hpnicfEponModeSwitch.name: hpnicfEponModeSwitch
hpnicfEponModeSwitch.description: cmode - epon standard mode. hmode - private mode.

hpnicfEponAutomaticMode.name: hpnicfEponAutomaticMode
hpnicfEponAutomaticMode.description: Automatic mode setting: when enabled - after new OLT is added, the OLT stack sets its encryption mode to 'triple churning' and configure the OLT to authorize ONU MAC addresses according to its table. enable -enable automatic mode. disable -disable automatic mode.

hpnicfEponOamDiscoveryTimeout.name: hpnicfEponOamDiscoveryTimeout
hpnicfEponOamDiscoveryTimeout.description: Time out parameter for extended OAM discovery process message, ranging from 0 to 2550, measured in 100 milliseconds.

hpnicfEponEncryptionNoReplyTimeOut.name: hpnicfEponEncryptionNoReplyTimeOut
hpnicfEponEncryptionNoReplyTimeOut.description: Encryption response timeout, ranging from 1 to 2550, measured in 100 milliseconds.

hpnicfEponEncryptionUpdateTime.name: hpnicfEponEncryptionUpdateTime
hpnicfEponEncryptionUpdateTime.description: Encryption key update timer for all ONUs on slot, indicated by hpnicfEponSlotIndex, ranging from 1 to 255, measured in seconds.

hpnicfEponAutoBindStatus.name: hpnicfEponAutoBindStatus
hpnicfEponAutoBindStatus.description: enable - auto bind ONU ID when the ONU registered in the EPON system. disable - need manual bind ONU ID when the ONU registered in the EPON system.

hpnicfEponAutoUpdateTable.name: hpnicfEponAutoUpdateTable
hpnicfEponAutoUpdateTable.description: EPON auto update ONU application configuration.

hpnicfEponAutoUpdateEntry.name: hpnicfEponAutoUpdateEntry
hpnicfEponAutoUpdateEntry.description: The entry of the table hpnicfEponAutoUpdateTable.

hpnicfEponAutoUpdateFileName.name: hpnicfEponAutoUpdateFileName
hpnicfEponAutoUpdateFileName.description: The name of ONU application file, the file name must be valid and include the path. It is a zero length string by default.

hpnicfEponAutoUpdateSchedStatus.name: hpnicfEponAutoUpdateSchedStatus
hpnicfEponAutoUpdateSchedStatus.description: The status of schedule update configuration. The hpnicfEponAutoUpdateFileName must be set before enable hpnicfEponAutoUpdateSchedStatus. enable - enable ONU schedule update. disable - disable ONU schedule update.

hpnicfEponAutoUpdateSchedTime.name: hpnicfEponAutoUpdateSchedTime
hpnicfEponAutoUpdateSchedTime.description: The schedule update timing configuration is related to the hpnicfEponAutoUpdateSchedType. auto update daily: the string format is hhmm auto update weekly: the string format is hhmmw 'w' means update weekly, it ranges from 0 to 6: 0 - Sunday. 1 - Monday. 2 - Tuesday. 3 - Wednesday. 4 - Thursday. 5 - Friday. 6 - Saturday. auto update in coming date : the string format is hhmmyyyymmdd. The configuration will take effect only if hpnicfEponAutoUpdateSchedStatus is enabled.

hpnicfEponAutoUpdateSchedType.name: hpnicfEponAutoUpdateSchedType
hpnicfEponAutoUpdateSchedType.description: The update type of auto updating configuration. daily - update ONU application every day. weekly - update ONU application every week. comingdate - update ONU application on coming date.

hpnicfEponAutoUpdateRealTimeStatus.name: hpnicfEponAutoUpdateRealTimeStatus
hpnicfEponAutoUpdateRealTimeStatus.description: The status of real time update configuration. The hpnicfEponAutoUpdateFileName must be set before enable hpnicfEponAutoUpdateRealTimeStatus. enable - enable ONU real time update. disable - disable ONU real time update.

hpnicfEponOuiIndexNextEntry.name: hpnicfEponOuiIndexNextEntry
hpnicfEponOuiIndexNextEntry.description: The entry of the table hpnicfEponOuiIndexNextTable.

hpnicfEponOuiIndexNext.name: hpnicfEponOuiIndexNext
hpnicfEponOuiIndexNext.description: This object contains an appropriate value to be used for hpnicfEponOuiIndex when creating rows in the hpnicfEponOuiTable.

hpnicfEponOuiTable.name: hpnicfEponOuiTable
hpnicfEponOuiTable.description: List of OUI and OAM supported by OLT.

hpnicfEponOuiEntry.name: hpnicfEponOuiEntry
hpnicfEponOuiEntry.description: The entry of the table hpnicfEponOuiTable.

hpnicfEponOuiValue.name: hpnicfEponOuiValue
hpnicfEponOuiValue.description: OUI list supported by the extended OAM discovery process. The OUI is composed of six octets. The first six octets denote the first OUI , the second six octets denote the second OUI, and the like.

hpnicfEponOamVersion.name: hpnicfEponOamVersion
hpnicfEponOamVersion.description: Version of OAM protocol defined by the organization denoted by OUI.

hpnicfEponOuiRowStatus.name: hpnicfEponOuiRowStatus
hpnicfEponOuiRowStatus.description: The status of this table entry. Only active, createAndGo and the destory are supported.

hpnicfEponMulticastControlEntry.name: hpnicfEponMulticastControlEntry
hpnicfEponMulticastControlEntry.description: The entry of the table hpnicfEponMulticastControlTable.

hpnicfEponMulticastAddressList.name: hpnicfEponMulticastAddressList
hpnicfEponMulticastAddressList.description: The multicast address, each four octets represents a multicast address, the address section ranging from the first four octets to the second four octets, and the like.

hpnicfEponMulticastStatus.name: hpnicfEponMulticastStatus
hpnicfEponMulticastStatus.description: The status of this table entry. Only active, createAndGo and the destory are supported.

hpnicfEponDbaUpdateFileName.name: hpnicfEponDbaUpdateFileName
hpnicfEponDbaUpdateFileName.description: The name of a binary file which is loaded to the OLT from an external source. Note that the filename must contain the file path.

hpnicfEponOnuUpdateFileName.name: hpnicfEponOnuUpdateFileName
hpnicfEponOnuUpdateFileName.description: The filename of the ONU firmware to be updated. Note that the filename must contain the file path.

hpnicfOltSysManTable.name: hpnicfOltSysManTable
hpnicfOltSysManTable.description: This table defines several OLT system parameters: (1)laser on time (2)laser off time (3)whether multiple copy broadcast (4)whether discard packet (5)self test (6)self test result

hpnicfOltSysManEntry.name: hpnicfOltSysManEntry
hpnicfOltSysManEntry.description: The entry of the table hpnicfOltSysManTable.

hpnicfOltLaserOnTime.name: hpnicfOltLaserOnTime
hpnicfOltLaserOnTime.description: The laser on time of the ONUs during the discovery process, measured in Time Quanta(TQ).

hpnicfOltLaserOffTime.name: hpnicfOltLaserOffTime
hpnicfOltLaserOffTime.description: The laser off time of the ONUs during the discovery process, measured in TQ.

hpnicfOltMultiCopyBrdCast.name: hpnicfOltMultiCopyBrdCast
hpnicfOltMultiCopyBrdCast.description: true/false filtering of tagged multicast frames. The software avert tagged downstream frames with multicast or broadcast DA to the PON and not to the CPU, except for special multicast frames (link-constraint, IGMP control and ARP) that are passed to the CPU regardless of this feature.

hpnicfOltEnableDiscardPacket.name: hpnicfOltEnableDiscardPacket
hpnicfOltEnableDiscardPacket.description: Forward(false)/discard(true) any frames received from unlearned source address when the inside address table of the original ONU entry reach to the limit.

hpnicfOltSelfTest.name: hpnicfOltSelfTest
hpnicfOltSelfTest.description: selftest(1): Test OLT to check whether it's OK.

hpnicfOltSelfTestResult.name: hpnicfOltSelfTestResult
hpnicfOltSelfTestResult.description: The self test result of the specific OLT. other(1): The self test result is another reason. ok(2): The self test result is OK. fail(3): The self test result is fail.

hpnicfOltMaxRtt.name: hpnicfOltMaxRtt
hpnicfOltMaxRtt.description: Set the max Round Trip Time of this OLT.

hpnicfOltInfoTable.name: hpnicfOltInfoTable
hpnicfOltInfoTable.description: Primary status of the specified OLT. There will be one row in this table for each information in the system. (1)Software and hardware versions of the specified OLT (hpnicfOltFirmMajorVersion, hpnicfOltFirmMinorVersion, hpnicfOltHardMajorVersion, hpnicfOltHardMinorVersion) (2)Several physical capabilities of an OLT device. (hpnicfOltAgcLockTime, hpnicfOltAgcCdrTime) (3)The operation(activation) status of an OLT. (hpnicfOltMacAddress, hpnicfOltWorkMode)

hpnicfOltInfoEntry.name: hpnicfOltInfoEntry
hpnicfOltInfoEntry.description: The entry of the table hpnicfOltInfoTable.

hpnicfOltFirmMajorVersion.name: hpnicfOltFirmMajorVersion
hpnicfOltFirmMajorVersion.description: OLT firmware major version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

hpnicfOltFirmMinorVersion.name: hpnicfOltFirmMinorVersion
hpnicfOltFirmMinorVersion.description: OLT firmware minor version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

hpnicfOltHardMajorVersion.name: hpnicfOltHardMajorVersion
hpnicfOltHardMajorVersion.description: OLT hardware major version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

hpnicfOltHardMinorVersion.name: hpnicfOltHardMinorVersion
hpnicfOltHardMinorVersion.description: OLT hardware minor version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

hpnicfOltAgcLockTime.name: hpnicfOltAgcLockTime
hpnicfOltAgcLockTime.description: PON upstream data Automatic Gain Control(AGC) lock time, measured in TQ, range: 1 - 2^15. 0x7FFFFFFF: unknown value.

hpnicfOltAgcCdrTime.name: hpnicfOltAgcCdrTime
hpnicfOltAgcCdrTime.description: PON RX signal synchronization time, measured in TQ, range: 1 - 2^15. 0x7FFFFFFF: unknown value

hpnicfOltWorkMode.name: hpnicfOltWorkMode
hpnicfOltWorkMode.description: The operation(activation) modes of an OLT. other(1) - The OLT is in another mode. open(2) - The OLT is open. reset(3) - The OLT is reset. closed(4) - The OLT is closed.

hpnicfOltOpticalPowerTx.name: hpnicfOltOpticalPowerTx
hpnicfOltOpticalPowerTx.description: The optical power transmitted by this OLT. It measured in 0.01 dBm unit.

hpnicfOltOpticalPowerRx.name: hpnicfOltOpticalPowerRx
hpnicfOltOpticalPowerRx.description: The burst optical power received by this OLT. It measured in 0.01 dBm unit.

hpnicfOltDbaManTable.name: hpnicfOltDbaManTable
hpnicfOltDbaManTable.description: This table defines the primary parameters of the Dynamic Bandwidth Allocation(DBA) algorithm applying to the OLT.

hpnicfOltDbaManEntry.name: hpnicfOltDbaManEntry
hpnicfOltDbaManEntry.description: The entry of the table hpnicfOltDbaManTable.

hpnicfOltDbaEnabledType.name: hpnicfOltDbaEnabledType
hpnicfOltDbaEnabledType.description: Enable different types of the DBA algorithm. Start upstream dynamic bandwidth allocation algorithm, replacing former bandwidth allocation mechanism. internal(1) - OLT internal Service Level Agreement(SLA) based algorithm, always being activated. external(2) - DBA algorithm in a binary file which is loaded to the OLT from an external source.

hpnicfOltDbaDiscovryFrequency.name: hpnicfOltDbaDiscovryFrequency
hpnicfOltDbaDiscovryFrequency.description: How often should the OLT send discovery frames to the ONUs, measured in grant cycles.

hpnicfOltDbaCycleLength.name: hpnicfOltDbaCycleLength
hpnicfOltDbaCycleLength.description: The grant cycle length in TQ units.

hpnicfOltDbaUpdate.name: hpnicfOltDbaUpdate
hpnicfOltDbaUpdate.description: Update(1): Update the DBA algorithm with a binary file which is loaded to the OLT from an external source(flash). Config the MIB object module hpnicfEponDbaUpdateFileName.

hpnicfOltDbaUpdateResult.name: hpnicfOltDbaUpdateResult
hpnicfOltDbaUpdateResult.description: The latest DBA update result. other: The DBA update result is another reason. ok: The DBA update result is OK. fail: The DBA update result is fail. fileNotExist: The DBA update failed because the file does not exist. notSetFilename: The DBA filename is not set.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmThresholdTable.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmThresholdTable
hpnicfOltPortAlarmThresholdTable.description: The table defines the alarm threshold of OLT.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmThresholdEntry.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmThresholdEntry
hpnicfOltPortAlarmThresholdEntry.description: The entry of the table hpnicfOltPortAlarmThresholdTable.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmBerEnabled.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmBerEnabled
hpnicfOltPortAlarmBerEnabled.description: Behavior of BER alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmBerDirect.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmBerDirect
hpnicfOltPortAlarmBerDirect.description: Traffic direction to monitor for BER alarm.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmBerThreshold.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmBerThreshold
hpnicfOltPortAlarmBerThreshold.description: BER threshold exceed which the alarm is raised.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmFerEnabled.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmFerEnabled
hpnicfOltPortAlarmFerEnabled.description: Behavior of FER alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmFerDirect.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmFerDirect
hpnicfOltPortAlarmFerDirect.description: Traffic direction to monitor for FER alarm.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmFerThreshold.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmFerThreshold
hpnicfOltPortAlarmFerThreshold.description: Frame error rate exceed threshold then the alarm is raised.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchEnabled.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchEnabled
hpnicfOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchEnabled.description: Behavior of LLID mismatch alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchThreshold.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchThreshold
hpnicfOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchThreshold.description: The minimal number of mismatched frames exceed threshold then LLID mismatch alarm is raised.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmRemoteStableEnabled.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmRemoteStableEnabled
hpnicfOltPortAlarmRemoteStableEnabled.description: Behavior of remote stable alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmLocalStableEnabled.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmLocalStableEnabled
hpnicfOltPortAlarmLocalStableEnabled.description: Behavior of local stable alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmRegistrationEnabled.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmRegistrationEnabled
hpnicfOltPortAlarmRegistrationEnabled.description: Behavior of registration alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmOamDisconnectionEnable.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmOamDisconnectionEnabled
hpnicfOltPortAlarmOamDisconnectionEnable.description: Behavior of Operations Administration and Maintenance(OAM) disconnection alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmEncryptionKeyEnabled.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmEncryptionKeyEnabled
hpnicfOltPortAlarmEncryptionKeyEnabled.description: Behavior of encryption bad key alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmVendorSpecificEnabled.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmVendorSpecificEnabled
hpnicfOltPortAlarmVendorSpecificEnabled.description: Behavior of vendor specific alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmRegExcessEnabled.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmRegExcessEnabled
hpnicfOltPortAlarmRegExcessEnabled.description: Behavior of ONU registering over limitation alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmDFEEnabled.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmDFEEnabled
hpnicfOltPortAlarmDFEEnabled.description: Behavior of device fatal error alarm. true - alarm enable. false - alarm disable.

hpnicfOltLaserOnTimeMinVal.name: hpnicfOltLaserOnTimeMinVal
hpnicfOltLaserOnTimeMinVal.description: The lower limit of time which is confined to hpnicfOltLaserOnTime.

hpnicfOltLaserOnTimeMaxVal.name: hpnicfOltLaserOnTimeMaxVal
hpnicfOltLaserOnTimeMaxVal.description: The upper limit of time which is confined to hpnicfOltLaserOnTime.

hpnicfOltLaserOffTimeMinVal.name: hpnicfOltLaserOffTimeMinVal
hpnicfOltLaserOffTimeMinVal.description: The lower limit of time which is confined to hpnicfOltLaserOffTime.

hpnicfOltLaserOffTimeMaxVal.name: hpnicfOltLaserOffTimeMaxVal
hpnicfOltLaserOffTimeMaxVal.description: The upper limit of time which is confined to hpnicfOltLaserOffTime.

hpnicfOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMinVal.name: hpnicfOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMinVal
hpnicfOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMinVal.description: The lower limit of the discovery length which is confined to hpnicfOltDbaDiscoveryLength.

hpnicfOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMaxVal.name: hpnicfOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMaxVal
hpnicfOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMaxVal.description: The upper limit of the discovery length which is confined to hpnicfOltDbaDiscoveryLength.

hpnicfOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMinVal.name: hpnicfOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMinVal
hpnicfOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMinVal.description: The lower limit of the discovery length which is confined to hpnicfOltDbaDiscovryFrequency.

hpnicfOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMaxVal.name: hpnicfOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMaxVal
hpnicfOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMaxVal.description: The upper limit of the discovery length which is confined to hpnicfOltDbaDiscovryFrequency.

hpnicfOltDbaCycleLengthMinVal.name: hpnicfOltDbaCycleLengthMinVal
hpnicfOltDbaCycleLengthMinVal.description: The lower limit of the frames which is confined to hpnicfOltDbaCycleLength.

hpnicfOltDbaCycleLengthMaxVal.name: hpnicfOltDbaCycleLengthMaxVal
hpnicfOltDbaCycleLengthMaxVal.description: The upper limit of the frames which is confined to hpnicfOltDbaCycleLength.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmLlidMisMinVal.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmLlidMisMinVal
hpnicfOltPortAlarmLlidMisMinVal.description: The lower limit of the frames which is confined to hpnicfOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchThreshold.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmLlidMisMaxVal.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmLlidMisMaxVal
hpnicfOltPortAlarmLlidMisMaxVal.description: The upper limit of the frames which is confined to hpnicfOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchThreshold.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmBerMinVal.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmBerMinVal
hpnicfOltPortAlarmBerMinVal.description: The lower limit of threshold which is confined to hpnicfOltPortAlarmBerThreshold.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmBerMaxVal.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmBerMaxVal
hpnicfOltPortAlarmBerMaxVal.description: The upper limit of threshold which is confined to hpnicfOltPortAlarmBerThreshold.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmFerMinVal.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmFerMinVal
hpnicfOltPortAlarmFerMinVal.description: The lower limit of threshold which is confined to hpnicfOltPortAlarmFerThreshold.

hpnicfOltPortAlarmFerMaxVal.name: hpnicfOltPortAlarmFerMaxVal
hpnicfOltPortAlarmFerMaxVal.description: The upper limit of threshold which is confined to hpnicfOltPortAlarmFerThreshold.

hpnicfOnuSilentTable.name: hpnicfOnuSilentTable
hpnicfOnuSilentTable.description: This table is used for getting silent ONU information of OLT.

hpnicfOnuSilentEntry.name: hpnicfOnuSilentEntry
hpnicfOnuSilentEntry.description: The entry of the table hpnicfOnuSilentTable.

hpnicfOnuSilentMacAddr.name: hpnicfOnuSilentMacAddr
hpnicfOnuSilentMacAddr.description: The MAC address of silent ONUs in OLT.

hpnicfOnuSilentTime.name: hpnicfOnuSilentTime
hpnicfOnuSilentTime.description: The aging time of a silent ONU.

hpnicfOltUsingOnuTable.name: hpnicfOltUsingOnuTable
hpnicfOltUsingOnuTable.description: The table containing configurations to manage ONU interface(s) based on OLT interface.

hpnicfOltUsingOnuEntry.name: hpnicfOltUsingOnuEntry
hpnicfOltUsingOnuEntry.description: The entry of the table hpnicfOltUsingOnuTable.

hpnicfOltUsingOnuNum.name: hpnicfOltUsingOnuNum
hpnicfOltUsingOnuNum.description: The ONU interface number. This value is used to specify the ONU interface which the user wants to configure for an OLT interface.

hpnicfOltUsingOnuIfIndex.name: hpnicfOltUsingOnuIfIndex
hpnicfOltUsingOnuIfIndex.description: The ifIndex of the ONU interface.

hpnicfOltUsingOnuRowStatus.name: hpnicfOltUsingOnuRowStatus
hpnicfOltUsingOnuRowStatus.description: This object is responsible for managing the creation, deletion and modification of rows, which supports active status and CreatAndGo, destroy operation.

hpnicfOnuSysManTable.name: hpnicfOnuSysManTable
hpnicfOnuSysManTable.description: This table implements the following functions for ONUs: 1. Encrypting all downstream/upstream and downstream directions traffic destined to and originated from a specific LLID (ONU in current implementation). 2. Restart a process of ONU authentication, using the OLT (IEEE 802.1x) authenticator.

hpnicfOnuSysManEntry.name: hpnicfOnuSysManEntry
hpnicfOnuSysManEntry.description: The entry of the table hpnicfOnuSysManTable.

hpnicfOnuEncryptMan.name: hpnicfOnuEncryptMan
hpnicfOnuEncryptMan.description: Start encrypting all downstream/upstream and downstream directions traffic destined to and originated from a specific LLID (ONU in current implementation). ONU registration encryption key is used as an initial value. If the encryption key was updated after ONU registration, the last updated key is used. off(1): - Stop encrypting. downlink(2): - Start encrypting all downstream directions traffic. updownlink(3): - Start encrypting all downstream/upstream directions traffic.

hpnicfOnuReAuthorize.name: hpnicfOnuReAuthorize
hpnicfOnuReAuthorize.description: Restart a process of ONU authentication. If 802.1x authentication is enabled, the OLT (IEEE 802.1x) authenticator is applied. Otherwise, use the default authentication. Until the reauthentication succeeds, the ONU remains its previous authorization mode. The reauthentication process includes a new authentication request sent to the authentication server.

hpnicfOnuMulticastFilterStatus.name: hpnicfOnuMulticastFilterStatus
hpnicfOnuMulticastFilterStatus.description: true(1) - Multicast-Filter enable on ONU. false(2) - Multicast-Filter disable on ONU.

hpnicfOnuDbaReportQueueSetNumber.name: hpnicfOnuDbaReportQueueSetNumber
hpnicfOnuDbaReportQueueSetNumber.description: The number of queue sets reported in MPCP report frames.

hpnicfOnuRemoteFecStatus.name: hpnicfOnuRemoteFecStatus
hpnicfOnuRemoteFecStatus.description: Value that indicates status of the 1000BASE-PX PHY optional FEC Sublayer for forward error correction see [802.3ah] clause 65.2. enable - enable remote forward error correction. disable - disable remote forward error correction.

hpnicfOnuPortBerStatus.name: hpnicfOnuPortBerStatus
hpnicfOnuPortBerStatus.description: enable - enable ONU port bit error rate alarm. disable - disable ONU port bit error rate alarm.

hpnicfOnuMulticastControlMode.name: hpnicfOnuMulticastControlMode
hpnicfOnuMulticastControlMode.description: igmpsnooping - the traditional IGMP snooping mode. multicastcontrol - the specific multicast control mode.

hpnicfOnuAccessVlan.name: hpnicfOnuAccessVlan
hpnicfOnuAccessVlan.description: The VLAN ID assigned to untagged frames received on ONU.

hpnicfOnuEncryptKey.name: hpnicfOnuEncryptKey
hpnicfOnuEncryptKey.description: The encryption key, used to encrypt all downstream traffic destined to and/or upstream traffic originating from a specific ONU. It is a zero length, or MD5 hashed string, by default, the string is empty.

hpnicfOnuUniUpDownTrapStatus.name: hpnicfOnuUniUpDownTrapStatus
hpnicfOnuUniUpDownTrapStatus.description: true - A notification will be sent when UNI link status is change. false - Device will not sent notification when UNI link status is change.

hpnicfOnuFecStatus.name: hpnicfOnuFecStatus
hpnicfOnuFecStatus.description: Value that indicates status of the 1000BASE-PX PHY optional FEC Sublayer for forward error correction (include remote onu and local OLT) see [802.3ah] clause 65.2 enable - enable forward error correction. disable - disable forward error correction.

hpnicfOnuMcastCtrlHostAgingTime.name: hpnicfOnuMcastCtrlHostAgingTime
hpnicfOnuMcastCtrlHostAgingTime.description: The host aging time of multicast control mode on ONU, ranging from 200 to 1000, measured in seconds.

hpnicfOnuMulticastFastLeaveEnable.name: hpnicfOnuMulticastFastLeaveEnable
hpnicfOnuMulticastFastLeaveEnable.description: true(1) - Enable multicast fast leave attribute on all ethernet UNIs of the ONU. false(2) - Disable multicast fast leave attribute on all ethernet UNIs of the ONU.

hpnicfOnuPortIsolateEnable.name: hpnicfOnuPortIsolateEnable
hpnicfOnuPortIsolateEnable.description: true(1) - Enable port isolate setting on all ethernet UNIs of the ONU. false(2) - Disable port isolate setting on all ethernet UNIs of the ONU.

hpnicfOnuLinkTestTable.name: hpnicfOnuLinkTestTable
hpnicfOnuLinkTestTable.description: LLID link test applying to the ONU only including delay measurement option. The command tests a link to a single LLID over a period of time or once, using a variable number of measurement frames. The length of the measurement frames is also parameterized. The test uses a loopback mode of the ONU to return each measurement frame, loopback activation is done using randomly patterned OAM Protocol Data Unit(PDU) frames.

hpnicfOnuLinkTestFrameSize.name: hpnicfOnuLinkTestFrameSize
hpnicfOnuLinkTestFrameSize.description: Measurement frames data size, measured in bytes. Not including Preamble, SFD, VLAN tag, and FCS. Frame size minimum value is 56 - if VLAN tag is enabled('VLAN enable' field is set to ENABLE), and 60 - if VLAN tag is disabled. The actual measurement frames sent to the PON are always minimum 60 bytes long. When VLAN tag is enabled, the actual measurement frames size including FCS may reach (1514+4+4=)1522 bytes. 60(60 is VLAN tag disabled) - 1514 .

hpnicfOnuLinkTestDelay.name: hpnicfOnuLinkTestDelay
hpnicfOnuLinkTestDelay.description: true:Link test includes delay measurement, which corresponds to the difference between sent and received times(including granting delay and firmware processing time overheads). false:Link test not includes a delay measurement.

hpnicfOnuLinkTestVlanTag.name: hpnicfOnuLinkTestVlanTag
hpnicfOnuLinkTestVlanTag.description: true:Enable VLAN tag in link test frames. false:Link test not includes frames with VLAN tag.

hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultSentFrameNum.name: hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultSentFrameNum
hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultSentFrameNum.description: The total number of frames sent during the link test process.

hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultRetFrameNum.name: hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultRetFrameNum
hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultRetFrameNum.description: The total number of frames return back during the link test process.

hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultRetErrFrameNum.name: hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultRetErrFrameNum
hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultRetErrFrameNum.description: The total number of error frames return back during the link test process.

hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultMinDelay.name: hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultMinDelay
hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultMinDelay.description: The minimum delay time in TQ units, which corresponds to the difference between sent and received times (including granting delay and firmware processing time overheads). It's invalid if the field 'hpnicfOnuLinkTestDelay' is set to be true.

hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultMeanDelay.name: hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultMeanDelay
hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultMeanDelay.description: The average delay time in TQ units, which corresponds to the difference between sent and received times (including granting delay and firmware processing time overheads). It's invalid if the field 'hpnicfOnuLinkTestDelay' is set to be true.

hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultMaxDelay.name: hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultMaxDelay
hpnicfOnuLinkTestResultMaxDelay.description: The maximum delay time in TQ units, which corresponds to the difference between sent and received times (including granting delay and firmware processing time overheads). It's invalid if the field 'hpnicfOnuLinkTestDelay' is set to be true.

hpnicfOnuBandWidthTable.name: hpnicfOnuBandWidthTable
hpnicfOnuBandWidthTable.description: Set bandwidth policy parameters(restrictions)for a LLID (only for the ONU). Default policies are set to disable. Policy parameters will be erased upon LLID network disconnection.

hpnicfOnuDownStreamBandWidthPolicy.name: hpnicfOnuDownStreamBandWidthPolicy
hpnicfOnuDownStreamBandWidthPolicy.description: true:Enable static bandwidth configuration policing. false:Disable static bandwidth configuration policing.

hpnicfOnuDownStreamMaxBandWidth.name: hpnicfOnuDownStreamMaxBandWidth
hpnicfOnuDownStreamMaxBandWidth.description: Maximum bandwidth allowed for the ONU, measured in Kbits/Sec.

hpnicfOnuDownStreamMaxBurstSize.name: hpnicfOnuDownStreamMaxBurstSize
hpnicfOnuDownStreamMaxBurstSize.description: Maximal number of bytes in a burst. The value is truncated to the nearest smaller 128 bytes multiple value, measured in bytes.

hpnicfOnuDownStreamHighPriorityFirst.name: hpnicfOnuDownStreamHighPriorityFirst
hpnicfOnuDownStreamHighPriorityFirst.description: true:Enable high priority frames preference. false:Disable high priority frames preference.

hpnicfOnuDownStreamShortFrameFirst.name: hpnicfOnuDownStreamShortFrameFirst
hpnicfOnuDownStreamShortFrameFirst.description: true:Enable short frames preference. false:Disable short frames preference.

hpnicfOnuP2PBandWidthPolicy.name: hpnicfOnuP2PBandWidthPolicy
hpnicfOnuP2PBandWidthPolicy.description: true:Enable static bandwidth configuration policing. false:Disable static bandwidth configuration policing.

hpnicfOnuP2PMaxBandWidth.name: hpnicfOnuP2PMaxBandWidth
hpnicfOnuP2PMaxBandWidth.description: Maximum bandwidth allowed for the ONU, measured in Kbits/Sec.

hpnicfOnuP2PMaxBurstSize.name: hpnicfOnuP2PMaxBurstSize
hpnicfOnuP2PMaxBurstSize.description: Maximal number of bytes in a burst. The value is truncated to the nearest smaller 128 bytes multiple value, measured in bytes.

hpnicfOnuP2PHighPriorityFirst.name: hpnicfOnuP2PHighPriorityFirst
hpnicfOnuP2PHighPriorityFirst.description: true:Enable high priority frames preference. false:Disable high priority frames preference.

hpnicfOnuP2PShortFrameFirst.name: hpnicfOnuP2PShortFrameFirst
hpnicfOnuP2PShortFrameFirst.description: true:Enable short frames preference. false:Disable short frames preference.

hpnicfOnuSlaManTable.name: hpnicfOnuSlaManTable
hpnicfOnuSlaManTable.description: Two types of DBA algorithm are supported in the ONU. The internal SLA based algorithm is always activated. This table defines the primary parameter about the internal SLA algorithm.

hpnicfOnuSlaMaxBandWidth.name: hpnicfOnuSlaMaxBandWidth
hpnicfOnuSlaMaxBandWidth.description: Maximum bandwidth - measured in Kbit/s. The value of this object should be the multiple of the value of hpnicfOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal. The minimum bandwidth should not be larger than the maximum bandwidth.

hpnicfOnuSlaMinBandWidth.name: hpnicfOnuSlaMinBandWidth
hpnicfOnuSlaMinBandWidth.description: Minimum bandwidth - measured in Kbit/s. The value of this object should be the multiple of the value of hpnicfOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal. The maximum bandwidth should be larger than the minimum bandwidth.

hpnicfOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal.name: hpnicfOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal
hpnicfOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal.description: Granularity of bandwidth - measured in Kbit/s. The value of hpnicfOnuSlaMaxBandWidth and hpnicfOnuSlaMinBandWidth should be the multiple of the value of this object.

hpnicfOnuSlaDelay.name: hpnicfOnuSlaDelay
hpnicfOnuSlaDelay.description: low - low delay. high - high delay. The delay constraint of a specific ONU. Set to high may improve the bandwidth usage at the cost of delay.

hpnicfOnuSlaFixedBandWidth.name: hpnicfOnuSlaFixedBandWidth
hpnicfOnuSlaFixedBandWidth.description: Fixed bandwidth - measured in Kbit/s. The value of this object should be the multiple of the value of hpnicfOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal.

hpnicfOnuSlaPriorityClass.name: hpnicfOnuSlaPriorityClass
hpnicfOnuSlaPriorityClass.description: Precedence of this flow over others in case of contention. 0 is the lowest priority and 7 is the highest priority.

hpnicfOnuSlaFixedPacketSize.name: hpnicfOnuSlaFixedPacketSize
hpnicfOnuSlaFixedPacketSize.description: Fixed packet size - measured in byte. The value of this object should be valid when hpnicfOnuSlaFixedBandWidth is configured.

hpnicfOnuInfoTable.name: hpnicfOnuInfoTable
hpnicfOnuInfoTable.description: Primary status of the specified ONU. There will be one row in this table for each information in the system. (1)Software and hardware versions of the specified ONU (hpnicfOnuHardMajorVersion, hpnicfOnuHardMinorVersion, hpnicfOnuUniMacType) (2)Several physical capabilities of the ONU. (hpnicfOnuLaserOnTime, hpnicfOnuLaserOffTime, hpnicfOnuGrantFifoDep.) (3)The operation(activation) status of the ONU. (hpnicfOnuWorkMode)

hpnicfOnuHardMajorVersion.name: hpnicfOnuHardMajorVersion
hpnicfOnuHardMajorVersion.description: ONU hardware major version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

hpnicfOnuHardMinorVersion.name: hpnicfOnuHardMinorVersion
hpnicfOnuHardMinorVersion.description: ONU hardware minor version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

hpnicfOnuUniMacType.name: hpnicfOnuUniMacType
hpnicfOnuUniMacType.description: ONU User Network Interface(UNI) port MAC type.

hpnicfOnuLaserOnTime.name: hpnicfOnuLaserOnTime
hpnicfOnuLaserOnTime.description: The ONU laser on time measured in TQ units. If the object value is 0x7FFFFFFF, it means hpnicfOnuLaserOnTime is unknown.

hpnicfOnuLaserOffTime.name: hpnicfOnuLaserOffTime
hpnicfOnuLaserOffTime.description: The ONU laser off time measured in TQ units. If the object value is 0x7FFFFFFF, it means hpnicfOnuLaserOffTime is unknown.

hpnicfOnuGrantFifoDep.name: hpnicfOnuGrantFifoDep
hpnicfOnuGrantFifoDep.description: Maximal number of grant records an ONU can store, relevant to ONU only. range: 1 - 255. 0x7FFFFFFF: unknown value.

hpnicfOnuWorkMode.name: hpnicfOnuWorkMode
hpnicfOnuWorkMode.description: The operation(activation) mode of an ONU. other(1) - ONU is in another mode. on(2) - ONU is registered and authorized to the network. In this mode it works as a media converter. pending(3) - ONU has been registered to the PON, but not authorized to the network. off(4) - ONU is not registered to the network.

hpnicfOnuDistance.name: hpnicfOnuDistance
hpnicfOnuDistance.description: The distance between OLT and ONU, measured in meter.

hpnicfOnuLlid.name: hpnicfOnuLlid
hpnicfOnuLlid.description: The link layer identifier, which uniquely identifies the ONU of a specific OLT.

hpnicfOnuOpticalPowerReceivedByOlt.name: hpnicfOnuOpticalPowerReceivedByOlt
hpnicfOnuOpticalPowerReceivedByOlt.description: The burst ONU optical power received by OLT, and when the ONU status is up the value is usable. It measured in 0.01 dBm unit.

hpnicfOnuMacAddrInfoTable.name: hpnicfOnuMacAddrInfoTable
hpnicfOnuMacAddrInfoTable.description: This table used for getting MAC address information of ONU.

hpnicfOnuMacIndex.name: hpnicfOnuMacIndex
hpnicfOnuMacIndex.description: The index of ONUs in one OLT.

hpnicfOnuMacAddrFlag.name: hpnicfOnuMacAddrFlag
hpnicfOnuMacAddrFlag.description: The flag of ONU status. 1 - bound:The ONU is bound but not registered. 2 - registered:The ONU is registered but not bound. 3 - run:The ONU is registered and bound on one OLT. 4 - regIncorrect:The ONU is bound on one OLT and registered on another OLT.

hpnicfOnuBindMacAddrTable.name: hpnicfOnuBindMacAddrTable
hpnicfOnuBindMacAddrTable.description: This table implements the following functions for ONUs: Bind MAC of ONU.

hpnicfOnuBindMacAddrEntry.name: hpnicfOnuBindMacAddrEntry
hpnicfOnuBindMacAddrEntry.description: The entry of the table hpnicfOnuBindMacAddrTable.

hpnicfOnuBindMacAddress.name: hpnicfOnuBindMacAddress
hpnicfOnuBindMacAddress.description: Bind the MAC of ONU. While the MAC is not bound, the ONU can not go into effect and configurations can not be set. Set 0-0-0 (MAC address) to the EPON device port will unbind the relationship with the original MAC and configurations will be set to default values.

hpnicfOnuBindType.name: hpnicfOnuBindType
hpnicfOnuBindType.description: Set the binding type with the ONU which is confined to the index of hpnicfEponOnuTypeDescr.

hpnicfOnuFirmwareUpdateTable.name: hpnicfOnuFirmwareUpdateTable
hpnicfOnuFirmwareUpdateTable.description: This table implements the following functions for ONUs: 1. Update the ONU firmware. 2. Result of update ONU firmware.

hpnicfOnuFirmwareUpdateEntry.name: hpnicfOnuFirmwareUpdateEntry
hpnicfOnuFirmwareUpdateEntry.description: The entry of the table hpnicfOnuFirmwareUpdateTable.

hpnicfOnuUpdate.name: hpnicfOnuUpdate
hpnicfOnuUpdate.description: update(1): Update the ONU firmware. Config the MIB object module hpnicfEponOnuUpdateFileName with the filename of ONU firmware first.

hpnicfOnuUpdateResult.name: hpnicfOnuUpdateResult
hpnicfOnuUpdateResult.description: The ONU firmware update result. updating - The ONU is updating firmware right now. ok - The ONU update result is OK. fail - The ONU update result is fail. fileNotExist - The ONU update failed because the file does not exist. notSetFilename - The ONU firmware filename is not set. fileNotMatchONU - The ONU firmware does not match the ONU. timeout - The ONU responses timeout. otherError - The ONU update result is unknown.

hpnicfOnuUpdateFileName.name: hpnicfOnuUpdateFileName
hpnicfOnuUpdateFileName.description: The filename of the ONU firmware to be updated. Note that the filename must contain the file path.

hpnicfOnuLinkTestFrameNumMinVal.name: hpnicfOnuLinkTestFrameNumMinVal
hpnicfOnuLinkTestFrameNumMinVal.description: The lower limit of measurement frames which is confined to hpnicfOnuLinkTestFrameNum.

hpnicfOnuLinkTestFrameNumMaxVal.name: hpnicfOnuLinkTestFrameNumMaxVal
hpnicfOnuLinkTestFrameNumMaxVal.description: The upper limit of measurement frames which is confined to hpnicfOnuLinkTestFrameNum.

hpnicfOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMinVal.name: hpnicfOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMinVal
hpnicfOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMinVal.description: The lower limit of maximum-bandwidth which is confined to hpnicfOnuSlaMaxBandWidth.

hpnicfOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMaxVal.name: hpnicfOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMaxVal
hpnicfOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMaxVal.description: The upper limit of maximum-bandwidth which is confined to hpnicfOnuSlaMaxBandWidth.

hpnicfOnuSlaMinBandWidthMinVal.name: hpnicfOnuSlaMinBandWidthMinVal
hpnicfOnuSlaMinBandWidthMinVal.description: The lower limit of minimum-bandwidth which is confined to hpnicfOnuSlaMinBandWidth.

hpnicfOnuSlaMinBandWidthMaxVal.name: hpnicfOnuSlaMinBandWidthMaxVal
hpnicfOnuSlaMinBandWidthMaxVal.description: The upper limit of minimum-bandwidth which is confined to hpnicfOnuSlaMinBandWidth.

hpnicfEponOnuTypeManTable.name: hpnicfEponOnuTypeManTable
hpnicfEponOnuTypeManTable.description: This table is used for getting ONU bind type in current version.

hpnicfEponOnuTypeDescr.name: hpnicfEponOnuTypeDescr
hpnicfEponOnuTypeDescr.description: The ONU type description which can be used to bind ONU in current version. the value of hpnicfOnuBindType can be configured by the index of hpnicfEponOnuTypeDescr.

hpnicfOnuPacketManTable.name: hpnicfOnuPacketManTable
hpnicfOnuPacketManTable.description: This table implements the following functions: (1)Manage packet priority trust mode. (2)Manage packet queue-scheduler mode.

hpnicfOnuPriorityTrust.name: hpnicfOnuPriorityTrust
hpnicfOnuPriorityTrust.description: The QOS mode which is assigned on ONU. dscp - The service dscp of politic Priority. ipprecedence - The service IP precedence of politic Priority. cos - The service cos of politic Priority.

hpnicfOnuQueueScheduler.name: hpnicfOnuQueueScheduler
hpnicfOnuQueueScheduler.description: The packet queue-scheduler mode which is assigned on ONU. spq - strict priority queuing. wfq - specifies the weights for weighted round-robin queuing.

hpnicfOnuProtocolTable.name: hpnicfOnuProtocolTable
hpnicfOnuProtocolTable.description: This table implements the following functions: (1)Manage STP status. (2)Manage IGMP-snooping. (3)Manage DHCP-snooping.

hpnicfOnuStpStatus.name: hpnicfOnuStpStatus
hpnicfOnuStpStatus.description: true(1) - STP status enable on ONU. false(2) - STP status disable on ONU.

hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingStatus.name: hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingStatus
hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingStatus.description: true(1) - IGMP snooping status enable on ONU. false(2) - IGMP snooping status disable on ONU.

hpnicfOnuDhcpsnoopingOption82.name: hpnicfOnuDhcpsnoopingOption82
hpnicfOnuDhcpsnoopingOption82.description: true(1) - DHCP snooping Option 82 status enable on ONU. false(2) - DHCP snooping Option 82 status disable on ONU.

hpnicfOnuDhcpsnooping.name: hpnicfOnuDhcpsnooping
hpnicfOnuDhcpsnooping.description: true(1) - DHCP snooping status enable on ONU. false(2) - DHCP snooping status disable on ONU.

hpnicfOnuPppoe.name: hpnicfOnuPppoe
hpnicfOnuPppoe.description: true(1) - PPPOE status enable on ONU. false(2) - PPPOE status disable on ONU.

hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingHostAgingT.name: hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingHostAgingT
hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingHostAgingT.description: Set the host aging time of IGMP on ONU.

hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingMaxRespT.name: hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingMaxRespT
hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingMaxRespT.description: Set the max response time of IGMP on ONU.

hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingRouterAgingT.name: hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingRouterAgingT
hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingRouterAgingT.description: Set the router aging time of IGMP on ONU.

hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingAggReportS.name: hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingAggReportS
hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingAggReportS.description: true(1) - Igmp snooping aggregation report status enable on ONU. false(2) - Igmp snooping aggregation report status disable on ONU.

hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingAggLeaveS.name: hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingAggLeaveS
hpnicfOnuIgmpSnoopingAggLeaveS.description: true(1) - Igmp snooping aggregation leave status enable on ONU. false(2) - Igmp snooping aggregation leave status disable on ONU.

hpnicfOnuDot1xTable.name: hpnicfOnuDot1xTable
hpnicfOnuDot1xTable.description: This table implements the following functions: (1)Manage 802.1x account. (2)Manage 802.1x password. ONU will be authorized to send and receive frames when the account and the password are all right, otherwise this ONU will be unavailable.

hpnicfOnuDot1xAccount.name: hpnicfOnuDot1xAccount
hpnicfOnuDot1xAccount.description: ONU 802.1X account. The object value cannot be set as 'a', 'al' or 'all'. The object should be set together with hpnicfOnuDot1xPassword.

hpnicfOnuDot1xPassword.name: hpnicfOnuDot1xPassword
hpnicfOnuDot1xPassword.description: ONU 802.1X password. The object should be set together with hpnicfOnuDot1xAccount.

hpnicfOnuPriorityQueueTable.name: hpnicfOnuPriorityQueueTable
hpnicfOnuPriorityQueueTable.description: This table contains specific information of priority queue.

hpnicfOnuQueueId.name: hpnicfOnuQueueId
hpnicfOnuQueueId.description: The queue ID of priority queue.

hpnicfOnuQueueSize.name: hpnicfOnuQueueSize
hpnicfOnuQueueSize.description: The size of priority queue, measured in percent. The total length of all priority queues is a constant, by default, it is assigned to all of the priority queues evenly. The length of each priority queue may be changed by changing the value of hpnicfOnuPriorityQueueSize. The total size of the inbound or outbound priority queues should be not more than 100.

hpnicfOnuCountTable.name: hpnicfOnuCountTable
hpnicfOnuCountTable.description: This table contains statistics of ONU port.

hpnicfOnuInCRCErrPkts.name: hpnicfOnuInCRCErrPkts
hpnicfOnuInCRCErrPkts.description: The total number of frames received with bad CRC checksum.

hpnicfOnuOutDroppedFrames.name: hpnicfOnuOutDroppedFrames
hpnicfOnuOutDroppedFrames.description: The total number of frames dropped because of buffer failure.

hpnicfOnuPriorityQueueSizeMinVal.name: hpnicfOnuPriorityQueueSizeMinVal
hpnicfOnuPriorityQueueSizeMinVal.description: The lower limit of queue size which is confined to hpnicfOnuQueueSize.

hpnicfOnuPriorityQueueSizeMaxVal.name: hpnicfOnuPriorityQueueSizeMaxVal
hpnicfOnuPriorityQueueSizeMaxVal.description: The upper limit of queue size which is confined to hpnicfOnuQueueSize.

hpnicfOnuUpdateByTypeNextIndex.name: hpnicfOnuUpdateByTypeNextIndex
hpnicfOnuUpdateByTypeNextIndex.description: Offer a free index of hpnicfOnuFirmwareUpdateByTypeTable.

hpnicfOnuQueueBandwidthTable.name: hpnicfOnuQueueBandwidthTable
hpnicfOnuQueueBandwidthTable.description: This table contains specific bandwidth information of ONU priority queue.

hpnicfOnuQueueMaxBandwidth.name: hpnicfOnuQueueMaxBandwidth
hpnicfOnuQueueMaxBandwidth.description: The maximum bandwidth of specific ONU priority queue, measured in 100Kbps.

hpnicfOnuQueueMaxBurstsize.name: hpnicfOnuQueueMaxBurstsize
hpnicfOnuQueueMaxBurstsize.description: The maximum burst size of specific ONU priority queue, measured in 64Bytes.

hpnicfOnuQueuePolicyStatus.name: hpnicfOnuQueuePolicyStatus
hpnicfOnuQueuePolicyStatus.description: true - enable bandwidth policy false - disable bandwidth policy The bandwidth administrative status of specific ONU priority queue.

hpnicfOnuIpAddress.name: hpnicfOnuIpAddress
hpnicfOnuIpAddress.description: The IP address assigned to the ONU.

hpnicfOnuIpAddressMask.name: hpnicfOnuIpAddressMask
hpnicfOnuIpAddressMask.description: The mask of IP address denoted by hpnicfOnuIpAddress.

hpnicfOnuIpAddressGateway.name: hpnicfOnuIpAddressGateway
hpnicfOnuIpAddressGateway.description: The gateway of IP address denoted by hpnicfOnuIpAddress.

hpnicfOnuDhcpallocate.name: hpnicfOnuDhcpallocate
hpnicfOnuDhcpallocate.description: true(1) - ONU auto allocate IP address status enable. false(2) - ONU auto allocate IP address status disable.

hpnicfOnuManageVID.name: hpnicfOnuManageVID
hpnicfOnuManageVID.description: The management VLAN of ONU denoted by hpnicfOnuManageVID.

hpnicfOnuManageVlanIntfS.name: hpnicfOnuManageVlanIntfS
hpnicfOnuManageVlanIntfS.description: The management interface status of ONU denoted by hpnicfOnuManageVlanIntfS.

hpnicfOnuChipSetInfoTable.name: hpnicfOnuChipSetInfoTable
hpnicfOnuChipSetInfoTable.description: ONU vendor specific information of ONU.

hpnicfOnuChipSetVendorId.name: hpnicfOnuChipSetVendorId
hpnicfOnuChipSetVendorId.description: Chipset vendor ID, which identifies the ONU's PON chip vendor according JEDEC ID code.

hpnicfOnuChipSetModel.name: hpnicfOnuChipSetModel
hpnicfOnuChipSetModel.description: Chip model, numbering(range from 0 to 0xFF) by the chip vendor.

hpnicfOnuCapabilityEntry.name: hpnicfOnuCapabilityEntry
hpnicfOnuCapabilityEntry.description: The entry of the table hpnicfOnuCapabilityTable.

hpnicfOnuServiceSupported.name: hpnicfOnuServiceSupported
hpnicfOnuServiceSupported.description: Services types supported by the ONU. These functional groups can be supported independently. geinterfacesupport - supporting (1)/not supporting(0) Gbit Ethernet GE interface. feinterfacesupport - supporting (1)/not supporting(0) 100M Ethernet FE interface.(maximum rate is 100M, without GEinterface) voipservicesupport - supporting (1)/not supporting(0)VoIP service. tdmservicesupport - supporting (1)/not supporting(0)TDM CES service.

hpnicfOnuGEPortNumber.name: hpnicfOnuGEPortNumber
hpnicfOnuGEPortNumber.description: The current gigabit ethernet ports number supported by the ONU.

hpnicfOnuFEPortNumber.name: hpnicfOnuFEPortNumber
hpnicfOnuFEPortNumber.description: the current fast ethernet ports number supported by the ONU.

hpnicfOnuPOTSPortNumber.name: hpnicfOnuPOTSPortNumber
hpnicfOnuPOTSPortNumber.description: The current POTS ports number supported by the ONU

hpnicfOnuE1PortsNumber.name: hpnicfOnuE1PortsNumber
hpnicfOnuE1PortsNumber.description: The current E1 ports number supported by the ONU.

hpnicfOnuUpstreamQueueNumber.name: hpnicfOnuUpstreamQueueNumber
hpnicfOnuUpstreamQueueNumber.description: The number of upstream queues supported by the ONU.

hpnicfOnuMaxUpstreamQueuePerPort.name: hpnicfOnuMaxUpstreamQueuePerPort

hpnicfOnuRS485SessionRemotePort.description: The port of remote landing. When session type is 'udp', this is the peer port. When session type is 'tcpClient', this is the server port. When session type is 'tcpServer', this is invalid.

hpnicfOnuRS485SessionLocalPort.description: Local socket port. When session type is 'udp', this is local UDP socket port. When session type is 'tcpClient', this is invalid. When session type is 'tcpServer', this is the local port which will be listened.

hpnicfEponBatchOperationBySlotTable.name: hpnicfEponBatchOperationBySlotTable
hpnicfEponBatchOperationBySlotTable.description: This table is used for batch operation by slot.

hpnicfEponBatchOperationBySlotType.name: hpnicfEponBatchOperationBySlotType
hpnicfEponBatchOperationBySlotType.description: The types of batch operation by slot: 1 - resetUnknown, the object value is not set. 9 - updateDba, update OLT DBA algorithm. Config the MIB object module hpnicfEponDbaUpdateFileName. 10 - updateONU, update ONU firmware. Config the MIB object module hpnicfEponOnuUpdateFileName with the filename of ONU firmware first.

hpnicfEponBatchOperationBySlotResult.name: hpnicfEponBatchOperationBySlotResult
hpnicfEponBatchOperationBySlotResult.description: The result of batch operation. 0xFFFF - other, general error. 1 - working, operation is not completed. 2 - successful, completed successfully. 3 - failed because the DBA source file does not exist. 4 - failed because the ONU firmware file does not exist. 5 - failed because of not set the filename of DBA source. 6 - failed because of not set the filename of ONU firmware. 7 - failed because of not set slottype.

hpnicfEponBatchOperationByOLTTable.name: hpnicfEponBatchOperationByOLTTable

hpnicfEponBatchOperationByOLTResult.name: hpnicfEponBatchOperationByOLTResult
hpnicfEponBatchOperationByOLTResult.description: The result of batch operation: 0xFFFF -- other, gernal error. 1 -- working, operation is not completed. 2 -- successful, operation completed successfully. 4 -- failed because the ONU firmware file does not exist. 6 -- failed because of not set the filename of ONU firmware. 7 -- failed because of not set olttype.

hpnicfEponPortAlarmFerRecoverTrap.description: A hpnicfEponPortAlarmFerRecoverTrap notification is sent when a frame error rate threshold crossing event is detected and then recoverd.

hpnicfEponErrorLLIDFrameRecoverTrap.name: hpnicfEponErrorLLIDFrameRecoverTrap
hpnicfEponErrorLLIDFrameRecoverTrap.description: A hpnicfEponErrorLLIDFrameRecoverTrap notification is sent when a LLID mismatched frames rate threshold crossing event is detected and then recoverd.

hpnicfEponLoopBackEnableRecoverTrap.name: hpnicfEponLoopBackEnableRecoverTrap

hpnicfEponLocalStableRecoverTrap.name: hpnicfEponLocalStableRecoverTrap

hpnicfEponOamVendorSpecificRecoverTrap.name: hpnicfEponOamVendorSpecificRecoverTrap

hpnicfDot3OamNonThresholdRecoverEvent.name: hpnicfDot3OamNonThresholdRecoverEvent
hpnicfDot3OamNonThresholdRecoverEvent.description: A hpnicfDot3OamNonThresholdRecoverEvent notification is sent when hpnicfDot3OamNonThresholdEvent is detected and then recoverd.

hpnicfEponOnuRegExcessTrap.name: hpnicfEponOnuRegExcessTrap

hpnicfEponOnuRegExcessRecoverTrap.name: hpnicfEponOnuRegExcessRecoverTrap
hpnicfEponOnuRegExcessRecoverTrap.description: A hpnicfEponOnuRegExcessRecoverTrap notification is sent when hpnicfEponOnuRegExcessTrap is detected and then recoverd.

hpnicfEponOnuPowerOffTrap.name: hpnicfEponOnuPowerOffTrap
hpnicfEponOnuPowerOffTrap.description: A hpnicfEponOnuPowerOffTrap notification is sent when ONU is power off.

hpnicfEponOltSwitchoverTrap.name: hpnicfEponOltSwitchoverTrap

hpnicfEponOltDFETrap.name: hpnicfEponOltDFETrap

hpnicfEponOltDFERecoverTrap.name: hpnicfEponOltDFERecoverTrap
hpnicfEponOltDFERecoverTrap.description: A hpnicfEponOltDFERecoverTrap notification is sent when device fatal error is detected and then recoverd.

hpnicfEponOnuSilenceRecoverTrap.description: The hpnicfEponOnuSilenceRecoverTrap notification is sent when a silent ONU is bound in the OLT or the aging onu mac address is timeout.

hpnicfEponOnuUpdateResultTrap.name: hpnicfEponOnuUpdateResultTrap
hpnicfEponOnuUpdateResultTrap.description: A hpnicfEponUpdateResultTrap notification is sent when an ONU reported its firmware update result.

hpnicfEponOnuAutoBindTrap.name: hpnicfEponOnuAutoBindTrap
hpnicfEponOnuAutoBindTrap.description: A hpnicfEponOnuAutoBindTrap notification is sent when a silent ONU is bound automatically.

hpnicfEponOnuPortStpStateTrap.name: hpnicfEponOnuPortStpStateTrap
hpnicfEponOnuPortStpStateTrap.description: A hpnicfEponOnuPortStpStateTrap notification is sent when a port turns into another state in STP environment.

hpnicfEponOnuLaserFailedTrap.name: hpnicfEponOnuLaserFailedTrap

hpnicfOnuSmlkSwitchoverTrap.name: hpnicfOnuSmlkSwitchoverTrap
